statements.select: SELECT * FROM dbo.PronotedetailsMaterial WHERE PronoteHeaderID=#value# order by Inumber
SELECT * FROM PronotedetailsMaterial WHERE PronoteHeaderID=#headid# AND PronotedetailsID=#detailid#

select * from PronotedetailsMaterial where PronoteHeaderID=#PronoteHeaderID# and productId in(select productId from product where (ProductName>=#StartpId# or #StartpId# is null) and (ProductName<=#EndpId# or #EndpId# is null))
